main event: Flashing red light and radar pips were reported in Long Island Sound, approaching the Brooklyn shore station.
interesting points: The object was observed visually and on radar before disappearing,The sighting involved at least two surfaced objects reported in the area,The incident was logged under Project 10073 and associates with historical UFO investigations,The report generated multiple communications between military and government agencies,The conclusion of the report left the object unidentified, with various possible explanations offered.
sighted object: Flashing red light and radar pips
